description.text1: Some cookies are necessary for the service to function. The ones you can choose are used to:
description.text2: Some cookies come from companies we collaborate with. You can change or withdraw your consent at any time.

preferences.personalize: Customize content and features for you

essential.title: Essential
essential.description: To ensure our service works, certain data processing is necessary.
essential.consentText: AdjustIT saves your current cookie settings.

improvedExperience.title: Improved experience
improvedExperience.description: These cookies are used to customize content and features based on how you use AdjustIT.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: These cookies are used to develop and improve AdjustIT through anonymized statistics.
performance.statsText: AdjustIT analyzes behavior to improve the service. All information collected is anonymous.

korpaccess.title: KorpAccess
korpaccess.description: A smart and secure solution that turns your mobile into your digital key.
